description:
Isshin`s plan has rendered Ikusaba`s "Shadowfins" useless, and victory is right before the Adventure Club`s eyes... but then Ikusaba unleashes the power of his other Nanana`s Collection treasure, leaving Juugo in serious trouble. Then Tensai steps in, telling Ikusaba she`s figured out his power and offering him a proposal.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 八真重護が決める覚悟
